rules_text:
Reach, trample
[i]Augmented[/i] – {5}: If Ilcan Avenger has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it. This ability costs {5} less to activate if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn.
flavor_text: [i]The survivors of Ilcae, battle-hardened and fueled by grief, tear through the Wonderlands in desperate hope for a wish to resurrect their plane.[/i]
